definition: Zolotoy Rog or Golden Horn Bay in Vladivostok (famous for its pollution)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The city is located on the hills at the head of Zolotoy Rog Bay.
sentences.chinese: 海参葳坐落于金角湾前方的丘陵地区。

sentences.english: In the distance one can see the poles of the future bridge across Zolotoy Rog Bay.
sentences.chinese: 从远处，人们能看到未来横跨金角湾的大桥的两端。

definition: Nyeva or Neva River (through St Petersburg)
